attributes.action: Remove homework from school around England,Wales and Scotland.
attributes.additional_details: We would like for you to remove homework from Scotland, England and Wales because it doesn’t give kids any time to relax since everyday they come back from school and extra work is needed to be done by school therefore causes lots of stress for children and slaves them to do more work for nothing.
attributes.background: We would like for you to remove homework from Scotland, England and Wales because it brings a whole lot of stress upon parents and students and most of the time the homework does not even help in the near future so it is for nothing.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for the same action:

Abolish all homework:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643846
